about_the_game:
The way of the samurai is forged by training and fighting. Step into Tomoko's dojo, an unforgiving training ground where only the strongest survive. This time, there are no villages to save, only yourself to conquer.

Test your skills against 20 fierce waves of enemies in this fast-paced action game. Master legendary swords and ancient magic, dodge deadly attacks, and hone your techniques. With each wave come powerful enemies. Will you survive or fall?

🔥 Fast-paced combat: Slash your enemies with precise melee attacks.

⚔️ Evade and counter: Dodge danger and counter with perfect timing.

🌀 Harness ancient magic: Unleash powerful spells to defeat your enemies.

💀 Survive 20 brutal waves: The challenges get harder. Only the best will survive.

This standalone Dojo Trial is your chance to get a glimpse into the larger world of Mochiko

It's a stepping stone to the next big adventure featuring our Vtuber, Mochiko.

Are you ready to prove yourself? Enter the Dojo and fight!

Test your skills against 20 fierce waves of enemies in this fast-paced action game. Master legendary swords and ancient magic, dodge deadly attacks, and hone your techniques. With each wave come powerful enemies. Will you survive or fall?

🔥 Fast-paced combat: Slash your enemies with precise melee attacks.

⚔️ Evade and counter: Dodge danger and counter with perfect timing.

🌀 Harness ancient magic: Unleash powerful spells to defeat your enemies.

It's a stepping stone to the next big adventure featuring our Vtuber, Mochiko.

name: THE DOJO OF MOCHIKO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: core I3 10th gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 11
  • Processor: 7800x3d
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD 7900xtx
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: In this game, you must face and overcome countless waves of relentless enemies, testing your skills, strategy, and determination. Only those who prove their worth through battle will have a chance to claim victory. And if you manage to emerge victorious, a generous reward may await you.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
